text: Tick, Tick... Boom! (also stylized as tick, tick... BOOM!) is a 2021 American biographical musical drama movie directed by Lin-Manuel Miranda. It is based on the stage musical of the same name by Jonathan Larson. The movie stars Andrew Garfield, Robin de Jesús, Alexandra Shipp, Joshua Henry, Judith Light, and Vanessa Hudgens with Michaela Jaé Rodriguez. ==References== Category:2021 drama movies Category:2020s biographical movies Category:2021 musical movies Category:Netflix movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American musical movies
title: Tick, Tick... Boom! (movie)
